section.description: For more information on how to add built-in SVG images to a ControlBar see '[Adding a Button to a ControlBar]'. The options for the Button layout property are as follows:

case.title: Text only
case.description: Text only displays the button as text. The text to be displayed can be defined in the Button text property.

case.title: Image only
case.description: Image only displays an image for a button. The image can be set using the 'Icon' property. There are multiple ways of defining images for a ControlBar using this property. Using SVG is highly recommended and a number of pre-built SVG icons are available if the 'Style name' property on the properties page is set to 'Alpha'. It is also possible to use system icons and project images.

case.title: Text followed by Image
case.description: This option displays both text and an image on a button. The text is displayed before the image

case.title: Image followed by text
case.description: This option produces a button with both an image and text. The text is displayed after the image.
